segments.text: What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to use a computer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have your library card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a wait for the computers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to print your name on this list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Once a computer is available , I will let you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How am I supposed to log on to the computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All you do is type in the number on the back of your card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s it ? Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
